alert.note: Alert for East Polk; North Clearwater (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Polk and west central Clearwater Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Olga, or 36 miles southeast of Thief River Falls, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts possible, winds in excess of 40 mph, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bagley, Clearbrook, Gonvick, Gully, Trail, Olga and Weme. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
